title: Design and Application of Quality Assessment for Online English Education Content

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of job-related scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies to evaluate online learning content effectively in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically evaluate the physical structure (readability, layout) of online English educational content
Learners can analyze the cognitive effectiveness (clarity of information delivery) of multimedia elements (videos, images)
Learners can measure content flexibility (accessibility, modifiability) and usability (navigation efficiency) in real-world environments
Learners can diagnose the emotional impact (motivational elements) of educational content using survey-based assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
